channel.title: 2. Hands-on on FortiGate auto-scale and AWS GWLB
channel.description: Recent content in 2. Hands-on on FortiGate auto-scale and AWS GWLB

item.title: Start the resources
item.description: Every night (GMT-3 timezone) the EC2 instances are shutdown to save money and the FortiGate ASGs are set to zero, so if you enter in the AWS account is probably that there is somebody else using it, because I doubt somebody used the environment and forgot to shutdown, right? :D So, the first thing you will need to do, after logged into AWS account, is: Bring FortiGate VM up Make sure you are in N.
